Banner.Description: Full-stack web developer with one year of experience in building modern, responsive web applications. Skilled in React, Angular, and Node.js, I create efficient and user-friendly digital solutions.
AboutMe.Title: About me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: In addition to my front-end expertise, I have also built and tested APIs, and optimized backend code with ExpressJS, NodeJS, and databases such as MongoDB and MySQL. I am committed to continuous learning and strive to bring creativity and efficiency to every project I work on.

My approach involves implementing system improvements, standardizing patterns, and actively suggesting and executing ideas that enhance the projects I'm involved in. I value teamwork and collaboration and always aim to deliver quality work that exceeds expectations.
Experience.Title: Experience

Experience.Jobs.Title: Fullstack developer
Experience.Jobs.name: iFlair Web Technologies Pvt. Ltd.
Description: Developed and maintained a web-based application using Angular, Node.js, and MongoDB, resulting in improved user experience and increased performance.
Designed and implemented RESTful APIs to support multiple applications, using Node.js and Express.
Built a real-time chat application using WebSockets and Node.js, increasing communication and collaboration among team members.
Implementation of continuous integration and daily backups.
Creation of modules with complex reactive forms

Experience.Jobs.Title: Frontend developer Trainee
Experience.Jobs.name: indvibe infotech pvt ltd
Description: Developed and maintained web applications using  React.
Coding of API requests with RxJS.
Improved website performance by optimizing images and implementing caching techniques.
Collaborated with designers and back-end developers to create responsive and user-friendly web experiences

Experience.Jobs.Title: Independent
Experience.Jobs.name: Freelancer
Description: Implementing continuous improvements, working on frontend and backend.
Creating platforms with Angular,React, Nodejs, ExpressJS,  programmed with functional, reactive, and object-oriented programming paradigms.
Automation of processes with data structures.
Design layout with CSS , Bootstrap , TailWind , Figma , Photoshop etc.

FeatureProjects.Title: Projects that I made from Scratch
FeatureProjects.Label: Featured Project

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: E-Commerce Store
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: I developed a scalable E-Commerce Store that sells clothing, with dynamic product management and customer handling. The project includes secure Authentication services and Configurable Graphics and alarms. I also integrated feedback form logic for real-time parameter configuration and improvements.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Best Buy Mall
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Best Buy Mall is Online Shopping Mall where you can buy your groceries and household products from your favourite local stores. It has online chat,  order history, notification system on number and mail, auth, and stripe integration for secure payments.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Firebase Task Manager
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: The Firebase Task Manager features a streamlined login and signup system with email and password authentication. New users receive an email verification link for account activation. Once verified, users can access and store their tasks and preferences securely in Firebase Firestore, ensuring data security and privacy.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Jarvis Desktop Assistant
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Jarvis is an advanced Desktop Assistant that allows seamless interaction with your computer through voice commands. Perform tasks such as opening YouTube, Instagram, or searching the internet effortlessly by speaking simple commands like 'Jarvis, open YouTube'. Control system functions such as shutdown or restart with ease, making your daily tasks smoother and more efficient

OtherProjects.Title: More personal projects

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Weather Application
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: The Weather Application uses the OpenWeather API for accurate forecasts and dynamically changes its widget background based on the time of day. Daytime features a sunny background, while nighttime shows a night sky. This improves user experience and provides better visualization for intuitive weather monitoring.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: JWT Integration
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: In a project integrating Angular, Node.js, and MongoDB, JSON Web Token (JWT) is used for secure authentication. Upon user login, the server issues a JWT, which is stored in the client's local storage for easy access during subsequent sessions.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Crud Operation in Json Server
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: In Angular, use JSON Server as a mock REST API for CRUD operations with a TypeScript front end. Implement methods for creating, reading, updating, and deleting data from the server, while maintaining proper state management and error handling in the application..

Contact.Title: Get in touch!
Contact.Content: I will be happy to receive your contact if you want to talk about new opportunities. Write me, and I will reply as soon as I see your message.
